metadata.feature_description: Test interactive UI elements including inline editing, animations, and real-time validation.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Click row to expand inline edit form

steps.action: Clicked on 'Average time on page' row in the Influence table
steps.expected: Inline edit form should expand below the clicked row
steps.actual: Inline edit form expanded showing Goal Type dropdown, Weight, Value, Min Value, Max Value fields, and Cancel/Save buttons

steps.action: Clicked Cancel button to close the inline edit form
steps.expected: Form should slide up with animation and collapse
steps.actual: Form slid up smoothly using jQuery slideUp animation (200ms) and the edit form disappeared

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test Save button and toast notifications for success

steps.action: Opened inline edit form and clicked Save button
steps.expected: Save button should change text to 'Saving...' during save, then show success toast notification
steps.actual: Save operation completed successfully, toast notification appeared showing 'Item successfully saved.' with Success icon. The Save button text change to 'Saving...' happens very briefly during API call.

steps.action: Opened inline edit form and entered Min Value (200) greater than Max Value (100), then clicked Save
steps.expected: Validation error should appear and prevent save
steps.actual: Validation prevented save operation. A red validation error indicator appeared next to the Min Value field. Form remained open, confirming validation blocked the save.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify confirmation dialog for delete operations

steps.action: Clicked Remove button on an influence goal row
steps.expected: Confirmation dialog should appear asking to confirm deletion
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog appeared with warning icon, message 'Are you sure you want to delete this item?', and Cancel/Delete buttons

steps.action: Clicked Cancel button in the confirmation dialog
steps.expected: Dialog should close and item should not be deleted
steps.actual: Dialog closed and item remained in the table - deletion was cancelled successfully

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test Settings section Save button and toast notification

steps.action: Clicked Save button in the Miscellaneous Community Settings section
steps.expected: Settings should save and show success toast notification
steps.actual: Settings saved successfully and toast notification appeared showing 'Item successfully saved.' with Success icon

observations: The page shows both 'Influence' and 'Miscellaneous Community Settings' sections together on one page - there are no separate tabs to switch between Settings and Influence. The suggested test scenario 'Verify tab switching between Settings and Influence' is not applicable as there are no tabs in the UI.

The Save button text change from 'Save' to 'Saving...' happens very briefly (during the API call) and reverts quickly upon completion. The code confirms this behavior in CommunitySettings.js:107 and :170.
Keyboard navigation and accessibility testing was not performed as it falls outside the STANDARD testing scope for Medium priority features.
Responsive layout testing on different screen sizes was not performed as it falls outside the STANDARD testing scope for Medium priority features.
